meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ample or spacious.
meanings.sent1: The amplenesses of the room allowed for comfortable movement.
meanings.sent2: The amplenesses of the field made it perfect for a game of soccer.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled to amplenesses with delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was filled with the amplenesses of love for her family.
meanings.sent5: The amplenesses of the forest enveloped them in a sense of peace and tranquility.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of something.
meanings.sent1: The amplenesses of the bookshelf surprised me with its capacity.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the amplenesses of the ocean stretching out before her.
meanings.sent3: The amplenesses of the cake left everyone at the party satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The amplenesses of his knowledge on the subject impressed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The amplenesses of the mountain range took their breath away with its grandeur.

meanings.definition: The abundance or fullness of something.
meanings.sent1: The garden displayed amplenesses of colorful flowers in bloom.
meanings.sent2: The amplenesses of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: She was known for her amplenesses of generosity towards others.
meanings.sent4: The amplenesses of opportunities in the city excited him.
meanings.sent5: The amplenesses of flavors in the dish delighted their taste buds.
